messages.subject: Re: gymnastics to diving
messages.msgSnippet: There  are other sports she is willing to try now----she would like to go into  cheerleading and diving at the public school.  She feels there she has  a
messages.messageBody:
There are other sports she is willing to try now----she would like to go
into cheerleading and diving at the public school. She feels there she
has a chance to get as good as she can because it is free.



****Once again I can mention my son Shawn. He was a dedicated in
gymnastics, but started late, and was too big. (not like your daughter - but they still
had him teach) When he started community college he took a diving class
which led him into that field. Thro the years he performed in a dive show and
became the national diving champion at his college for two years running.
Sometimes life has a way of taking a person to a different path. If it truly is
gymnastics I feel you and your family will find a way to make it happen. I
wish you the best.

Connie
www.homeschoolingreflections.com
www.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
